description:
Aaron is a 19-year-old college student from the South.
He is the youngest of seven siblings. He has four brothers and two sisters.
"Are your brothers as hot as you are?" we asked.
"I dunno," he said, smiling. "I guess we kind of look alike."
He's straight and single and he likes "bigger" girls.
"Well, not too big," he said. "I guess just a little plump. Bigger girls usually have bigger breasts."
"You like to just have them bounce all over your face?"
"Yeah," he said. "That's just ridiculous."
We had him explore his asshole a bit, and he has a nice one: tight and just a little bit of blond fur.
"I'm scared of it," he said, referring to his hole. "Unchartered territory!"
title: Aaron
